message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Can you meet me at that price?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I'm not quite comfortable meeting you at $8000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $9250. Let me know if that's something you'd be interested in.
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit above $9250. I'd be willing to meet you at $8500. Can you consider that?
I understand you're still a bit above your target, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $9000, but that's as low as I can go. Let me know if that's acceptable to you.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $8750. Can you consider that?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $9000, but I'm not going to go any lower. Let me know if you're willing to meet me there.
I understand you're close to your minimum price, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd like to make a serious offer of $8500. If you can meet me at that price, I'd be happy to move forward.
I've already made it clear that I won't go below $9000, Bob. I'm not willing to budge on the price. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'm afraid I'll have to consider other options.

I understand you're firm on the price, Alice, but I'm not willing to pay $9000. I'm making a final offer of $8250. If you can meet me at that price, I'll buy the product from you. If not, I'll have to explore other options.
